title: H by Steve Harvey, Turkey Giveaway, Murder Trial, Church Complaints, and more.
itunes:title: H by Steve Harvey, Turkey Giveaway, Murder Trial, Church Complaints, and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The CLO is the master when it comes to cleaning it up. J. Anthony Brown shares with us some bitter ass Kwanza memories. Steve Harvey got a new clothing line. Today we start with the all new tie collection. Just in time for Thanksgiving, we thank The Steve Harvey Nation for making us who we are and we are giving back. Fox is celebrating the WRONG thing! Would You Rather forced some hands today. Comedy Roulette gives you the things people blurt out at Thanksgiving dinner. The Verzuz battle betwee Chaka Khan and Stephanie Mills was iconic to say the least and it was a treat. Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve pushes us to purse our dreams now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
